dcterms:creator: Michał Kempka
Marek Wydmuch
Grzegorz Runc
Jakub Toczek
Wojciech Jaśkowski
dcterms:description: ViZDoom is a platform designed for reinforcement learning research, based on the classic video game Doom (1993). It allows for the training of agents in a simulated environment with various customizable parameters.
dcterms:title: ViZDoom

dcterms:description: Doom (1993) is the original video game that serves as the basis for the ViZDoom platform, providing a classic environment for testing reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Doom (1993)

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: The Arcade Learning Environment is a platform for evaluating general agents in reinforcement learning, providing a diverse set of Atari games for training and testing.
dcterms:title: Arcade Learning Environment

dcterms:description: Turtlebot 3 Waffle is a robot platform used for experiments in transferring learned policies from simulated environments to real-world applications.
dcterms:title: Turtlebot 3 Waffle
